name: World of Naples Lite
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2128410/World_of_Naples/

Full Version Coming Soon to Steam and Itch December 15. Price tag $4.99

40% discount during the first week of release.

Play the Lite version for Free. ONLY first world included. 

***Does Not Run-on Safari browser.

For a Better experience Play with Xbox or PSP controllers.

Keyboard: Numeric Key Enter, A/D movement. Alt/Ctrl/Shift abilities. Spacebar Jump. X select character.

This game is based on my childhood memories with my friend, and I would like for other players to experience the same. 

This game is all about playing with your family and friends on the same couch. Simple mechanics, nothing too crazy. Everyone should be able to grab a controller jump around, shoot, run and trash talk, but most importantly to HAVE FUN! with your buddies.

I grew up playing games where the progress was lost after turning off the console. Well, that's what I wanted for this game, but I added a twist to it. Collecting coins YAY! Hey, wait a second! That has been done a million times. Well....true. But in my game, you collect coins to pay a toll. Now the coins are more meaningful. 

Key features.

0-Linear gameplay.

1-Simple mechanics. Run, Jump, shoot, died.

2-No saving progress, old school :) 

3-Want to challenge your friend go over to the PVP arena.

4-Challenging bosses.

5-Unique art style.

6-Cute characters. But don't be fooled. This game is hard.

7-No tutorial. Figure it out as you go. Ask your friends, look online. 

Let's talk about the art style for a bit.

Is not a 100%-pixel game. This concept took some time for the team to grasp. The way I think of it is "boxy art style". Yes, there are some pixel elements here and there. Because I wanted the freedom to mix pixel and boxy. 

-SINGLE PLAYER

Let's see how far you can make it. Each world has its unique challenges.

-LOCAL CO-OP

Up to 4 players. This is really fun. 4 players are the right recipe for chaos.

-LOCAL PVP

Up to 4 players. I have so much fun here. Last man standing.
